casebody.data:
No. 10-5693. James Riva and Nate Ahmad, Petitioners v. Mary Elizabeth Heffernan, Massachusetts Secretary of Public Safety. 563 U.S. 962, 131 S. Ct. 2175,

179 L. Ed. 2d 938,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3302. April 25, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the Appeals Court of Massachusetts denied.

Same case below, 76 Mass. App. 1104, 918 N.E.2d 882.
